ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors are grateful to the Ministry of Higher Education and Scientific Research of Tunisia for financial support (LR11ES39) and to Fethia Harzallah-Skhiri (Higher Institute of Biotechnology of Monastir, Tunisia) for the botanical identification. In addition, the authors are grateful to Researchers Supporting Project number (RSP-2021/17) at King Saud University, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
